snippet.title: River City Girls 2: Double Dragon DLC - Official Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description: The legendary Double Dragons, Billy and Jimmy Lee, return to action in the upcoming River City Girls 2 premium Double Dragon DLC! These iconic martial arts masters are busting out of their dojos as distinct characters, each with their own individualized movesets! The DLC features full story-mode integration with character-specific voiceovers, a new dojo master, and an epic new rap song, while a free update will add new shops, selectable character color palettes, and more! Coming soon to Switch, PS4, PS5, Xbox, and PC!  https://wayforward.com/games/RCG2-double-dragon-dlc
